action.text: Amendment SA 2446 ruled out of order by the chair.

Motion to waive section 313(b)(1)(D) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2446, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 343.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(d) of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2446.
Amendment SA 2446 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2446 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 2360.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 313(b)(1)(D) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2446, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 343.
